## Participants needed! {.smaller}

**Topic:** 	The aim of the study is to investigate the factors underpinning conversational memory. 

**Location:** This study takes place online.

**What is involved?** In conversation, there are multiple factors that determine what will be remembered. The current research will offer insight into the cognitive mechanisms underlying the phenomenon. Participants will be asked to listen to a conversation and complete a fill-in-the-gap task. 

**Duration:** Time slots are available for 60 minutes, but the experiment will take around 30â€“45 minutes to complete.


**Eligibility:** Native English speaker. The study must run on a laptop/PC (not a phone or a tablet). Must NOT have signed up or completed Conversational Memory Version 2.
